description.value:
Your dwarf character has an assortment of inborn abilities, part and parcel of dwarven nature.

Age. Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

Size. Dwarves stand between 4 and 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet. Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

Dwarven Resilience. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.lJrC3KgiwR2bCQGN]{Dwarven Resilience} You have advantage on saving throws against poison and being knocked prone, and you have resistance against poison damage.

Dwarven Defense. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.KWr8okpoGEXY1L8D]{Dwarven Defense} You can take a moment to focus entirely on survival. As an action, you gain +5 to your AC until the start of your next turn, and you can spend a number of Hit Dice up to to your proficiency bonus to heal yourself. Roll the dice, add your Constitution modifier to each die, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

Dwarven Toughness. Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
